sense.name: Join or unite the pieces of; create by putting components or members together; repair by adding pieces.
sense.commentary: INCLUDES: PIECE TOGETHER, PIECE OUT, PIECE BACK TOGETHER
sense.examples: It's a script pieced together from interviews by CBS News. He pieced out what he knew from the witnesses. He had to be pieced back together after the accident. She pieced the china cup.

sense.name: Join during spinning.
sense.examples: She pieced a quilt. Piece the broken pieces of thread, slivers, and rovings. I pieced in the second pattern.

sense.name: Eat intermittently; take small bites of.
sense.examples: He pieced at the sandwich all morning.
